About

I am currently an MSc. student of Computational Statistics and Machine Learning (CSML) at University College London.

Previously, I was a Machine Learning Engineer at Revolut where I developed Gaussian Process models for time-series forecasting, transformer-based NLP models for customer support automation, and LSTM-based models for user churn prediction.

I completed my BASc. in Engineering Science at the University of Toronto.
